poemsDataJson.list_full: わが袖(そで)は 潮干(しほひ)に見(み)えぬ 沖(おき)の石(いし)の 人(ひと)こそ知(し)らね 乾(かわ)く間(ま)もなし
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Like a rock at sea,//At ebb-tide hidden from view,//Is my tear-drenched sleeve://Never for a moment dry,//And no one knows it is there.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Waga sode wa|Shiohi ni mienu|Oki no ishi no|Hito koso shirane|Kawaku ma mo nashi
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: ひとこそしらね かはくまもなし
poemsDataJson.author: 二条院讃岐(にじょういんのさぬき)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 人知れぬ片恋の嘆き、悲しみ
